code: import Environment from'../Environment';export const FILE_STORAGE_API_FILES='/filestorage/api/files';export const FILE_STORAGE_API='/filestorage/api';export const FILES_ENDPOINT='files';const LINK_ENDPOINT='link';export const getImageUrl=function(imageUrl){let link=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:false;if(imageUrl){const endpoint=link?`${FILES_ENDPOINT}/${LINK_ENDPOINT}`:FILES_ENDPOINT;return`${Environment.getOmniBuilderRootPath()}${FILE_STORAGE_API}/${endpoint}${imageUrl}`;}return'';};
